channel.title: SQL on Stefan Maron blog
channel.description: Recent content in SQL on Stefan Maron blog

item.title: Automated export objects from C/AL
item.description: This time I have some tips on how to use GIT integration when developing in C/AL with docker. When used to AL development one of the first things to notice when going back to C/AL is, that you do not have any version control. To solve this problem, I added a little bit of SQL code to the [Object] table as SQL Trigger. This trigger exports each edited object as TXT file to specified folder.
